settings.title: Our Collections
settings.description: Tap into the amazing blend of spirituality and style with our extensive handmade jewelry collection for both men and women.

settings.title: Our Story–Where It All Started
settings.story: With the aim to create jewelry that can help those in need of healing, empowerment and inspiration, we stepped into the business of jewelry designing. We create pieces using sacred and healing stones and symbols. Whether it is a diamond bracelet, gold ring, or beaded necklace, each design is created to bring healing and positivity to its wearer. The compass is a powerful symbol of motivation for someone who is feeling lost. And with our jewelry, we have captured this very essence of a compass. That's why our Compass jewelry is both a spiritual and fashion accessory, worn as sweet reminders of your inner spiritual aspirations. We believe that just like our souls, jewelry that embraces it too must be pious.

settings.title: The Inspiration
settings.description: Let your heart be your compass, your mind your map, your soul your guide...and you will never be lost. (Ritu Ghatourey). We think that this quote is what sums up the whole idea behind the creation of our brand.

settings.title: The Design
settings.description: Balance as a fundamental aspect of our design philosophy, with a healthy tension between meaning and form. Our pieces are also immersed in meaning for the stones used, are sacred and precious for their specific range of spiritual vibration.

settings.title: The Tradition
settings.description: We take pride in the fact that we are a rooted brand inspired by the splendid craftsmanship, awestruck artistry and rich Dutch heritage as well as the swag of the Caribbean soul. We stride to continually grow in unique directions.

settings.title: The Community
settings.description: Every single piece by Compass-Jewelry reflects the tradition, skills, experience and dedication of our artists. Whatever background, qualification and tradition they breathe in, they all share the same passion for creating mesmerizing jewelry.

settings.title: Fundamentals We Follow
settings.text: We are proud to present the duality of sophistication and ease on the one hand and the power of spiritual enrichment on the other. As a reliable jewelry brand, we specialize in ensuring top-notch customer experiences that are consciously designed to embody our four pillars of brand philosophy given below:
